name: Simplegradingscale2.0
body:
### Simple Grading Scale 2.0.

This grading scale gives a decimal grade for up to 200 hundred questions. It can give you a score from the number of problems missed or a score for the number of problems answered correctly



### Authors and Contributors
Sedrick Jefferson(@sedj601).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Feel free to email me at [sedrick.work@gmail.com] (sedrick.work@gmail.com). 
For the executable/exe/installation file click Download.zip. Next, unzip the file. Then open the unzipped folder and open the dist folder. Finally, open the bundles folder. Inside the bundles folder you will find the executable file. Use it to install the program on windows.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
